scripts.release:beforeVersion: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.release:afterVersion: npm run test && npm login && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run release:beforeVersion && npm version major && npm run release:afterVersion
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:beforeVersion && npm version minor && npm run release:afterVersion
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:beforeVersion && npm version patch && npm run release:afterVersion
